text: 3:5 Ua Me Ini 32:32-33; Onger Akaba 69:28; Matyu 10:32; Luk 10:20; 12:8; Filipai 4:3; Akar Mogomem 3:18; 19:8; 20:12Gumazamizir mɨdorozim gamua apaniba abɨriba, korotiar ghurghurir kamagh garitam arughtɨ, akɨnafarir God gumazamizir ikɨrɨmɨrir zurara itim iniamin ziaba osirizim, kɨ men ziaba angarighan kogham. Puvatɨ. Kɨ uan afeziam ko an enselbar damazibar gumazir kamɨn gun mɨkɨm suam, me konanaba.
